lead_paragraph: Stewart has been cleared to return to racing and will be in his car Friday at Richmond International Raceway.
snippet: Stewart has been cleared to return to racing and will be in his car Friday at Richmond International Raceway.
abstract: Three-time Nascar champion Tony Stewart returns to racing after recovering from fractured vetebra sustained in off-track accident.
